text: "Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!!" is a 1998 song by Dutch Eurodance group Vengaboys and is the lead single from their international reissue of The Party Album (1999). It topped the single charts in Belgium, Canada, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Scotland, Sweden and the United Kingdom and made the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland and Italy. It charted poorly in the United States where it made #84. == Track listings == * Dutch CD single # "Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!!" (airplay) – 3:23 # "Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!!"
